entry.title: Yo AngularJS
entry.content: Thinking about angularjs (and not only)? Give yoeman http://yeoman.io/ a try. Grunt Bower karma coffeescript npm – what else do you need to make you happy to build awesome web apps ?

entry.title: Key Shortcuts discovery made simple
entry.content: This is one of those deadly simple apps that make your life so much easier. Discover key shortcuts in zink on OSX. http://www.cheatsheetapp.com/CheatSheet/

entry.title: Big-O complexities
entry.content: A great cheat sheet with a summary of Big-O complexities for the most popular algorithms: http://bigocheatsheet.com/

entry.title: Streamlining your deployments with Heroku PipeLines
entry.content:
Ever thought that there could be a way to define a deployment flow?

Heroku team thought about it: https://blog.heroku.com/archives/2013/7/10/heroku-pipelines-beta

entry.title: Learn Haskell
entry.content: Want to learn Haskell? Check out this great free book available online: http://learnyouahaskell.com/

entry.title: Let's make it happen
entry.content:
I tried blogging in the past a few times. Mostly related to photography and I learned one thing – keep it simple.

The primary and only reason I’ve set this up is Me. I know this sounds damn arrogant. So the key three reasons are:

  1. I wanted to learn something new – Octopress looks really cool
  2. I wanted to keep track of all of those great articles that I read
  3. I sometimes want to just write down some of my own thoughts and ideas related to programming

That’s it. Let’s make it happen.
